hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Water Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

HF (Open Grotto).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.
